item.title: [DISTRELEC-6476] Q // 500 Error: Add to basket is not working
item.description:
All the add to basket functionality are not working anymore.
There is a 500 error
item.summary: Q // 500 Error: Add to basket is not working

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hello Surendra,
I have triggered the same Ajax call locally, in PROD and in TEST, and I have very different results. (see attachments)
It looks we have introduced a regression after the last deployment.
could you please investigate?
Thanks
Please review

Issue from Francesco

For all movex countries (AT, CH, LT + 4 eastern counties) there should be no validation for customer number fields during the registration.

item.description:
The text in the buttons on the registration page are too long. Please insert this shortend text:

Register as a Company: Регистрация юридического лица

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6352] FF // Integration of ELFA countries into composite job
item.description:
Could you please integrate the following FF exports into the composite cron job:

  • DKda => added to the composite job via impex in hAC (added to branch v3.2, 17.02.2015)
  • DKen => added to the composite job via impex in hAC (added to branch v3.2, 25.02.2015)
  • EEee EEet => added to the composite job via impex in hAC (added to branch v3.2, 25.02.2015)
  • EEru => added to the composite job via impex in hAC (added to branch v3.2, 25.02.2015)
  • NLnl => added to the composite job via impex in hAC (added to branch v3.2, 25.02.2015)
  • NLen => added to the composite job via impex in hAC (added to branch v3.2, 25.02.2015)
  • PLpl => added to the composite job via impex in hAC (added to branch v3.2, 25.02.2015)
  • PLen => added to the composite job via impex in hAC (added to branch v3.2, 25.02.2015)
  • LVlv => added to the composite job via impex in hAC (added to branch v3.2, 25.02.2015)
  • LVru => added to the composite job via impex in hAC (added to branch v3.2, 25.02.2015)
item.summary: FF // Integration of ELFA countries into composite job

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Temporarily removed the non ELFA countries from the FF export job. Only the above mentioned channels will be exported. (After the next deployment, ALL the channels will be exported again).

This is the impex to only perform the ELFA export jobs (instead of all):

INSERT_UPDATE CompositeCronJob;code[unique=true];compositeEntries(code);job(code)[default='compositeJobPerformable'];sessionUser(uid)[default='techUserFactFinderExportJobs'];sessionLanguage(isocode)[default='de'];sessionCurrency(isocode)[default='CHF'];sendEmail[default='true'];logLevelFile(code)[default='WARNING']
;distFACTFinderExportCronJob;"
	distrelec_7660_pl_en_export_attributes,
	distrelec_7660_pl_en_export_units,
	distrelec_7660_pl_en_export,
	distrelec_7660_pl_pl_export_attributes,
	distrelec_7660_pl_pl_export_units,
	distrelec_7660_pl_pl_export,
	distrelec_7680_dk_da_export_attributes,
	distrelec_7680_dk_da_export_units,
	distrelec_7680_dk_da_export,
	distrelec_7680_dk_en_export_attributes,
	distrelec_7680_dk_en_export_units,
	distrelec_7680_dk_en_export,
	distrelec_7790_ee_et_export_attributes,
	distrelec_7790_ee_et_export_units,
	distrelec_7790_ee_et_export,
	distrelec_7790_ee_ru_export_attributes,
	distrelec_7790_ee_ru_export_units,
	distrelec_7790_ee_ru_export,
	distrelec_7800_nl_en_export_attributes,
	distrelec_7800_nl_en_export_units,
	distrelec_7800_nl_en_export,
	distrelec_7800_nl_nl_export_attributes,
	distrelec_7800_nl_nl_export_units,
	distrelec_7800_nl_nl_export,
	distrelec_7810_lv_lv_export_attributes,
	distrelec_7810_lv_lv_export_units,
	distrelec_7810_lv_lv_export,
	distrelec_7810_lv_ru_export_attributes,
	distrelec_7810_lv_ru_export_units,
	distrelec_7810_lv_ru_export
"

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6329] Order Status Renaming
item.description:
Please rename the order status 01 from "Received" to "Created"

http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/ERP+Codelist+-+DistOrderStatus

EN: Created
DE: Erstellt
FR: Créé
IT: Creato
HU: Létrehozva
CZ: Vytvořeno
ROM: Creat
LIT: Sukurta
SWE: Skapat
NO: Opprettet
DK: Oprettet
NL: Gecreëerd
LAV: Izveidots
EST: Loodud
POL: Utworzono
FIN: Luotu
RUS: Создано

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
What about other translations ?
should I just make it as "(en) Created"?
Please add the other translations.

Hi Sam
Could you please organize all necessary translations?

Hi Florian,

Translation is now in place.

Sam

Hi Sam,

I added the provided translations. However, the following ones are missing:

  • FI
  • RU
  • SK

Hi Nabil,
Just received the FIN: Luotu
I will ask Oana for the RU.

Take care
so for SK we use CZ, right ?
According to Oana, yes man.
ok. waiting then for RU.

Hi Nabil,

I have added the RUS.

Take care
Sam
fixed

Hi Neeraj
This is not fixed (check screensot).
Could you please check why?
Done, in the code and in Hybris Prod

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6270] SK P// Wrong Key: People who bought this product also bought
item.description:
From: FM Distrelec info-cz
Sent: Montag, 26. Januar 2015 12:42
To: Ilie, Oana; Szuchomelli, Peter
Subject: Slowakische Online Shop

 

Guten Tag,

 

Wrong: People who bought this product also bought

Correct: Zákazníci, ktorí kúpili tento výrobok, kúpili aj

 

 

[1]https://www.distrelec.sk/sk/Cordless-power-tool-Kit-10-8-V-1-5Ah-Li-Ion-Panasonic-Power-Tools-EYC110LA2L/p/11096392

 

 

 

Mfg

Peter Kloss
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[1] https://www.distrelec.sk/sk/Cordless-power-tool-Kit-10-8-V-1-5Ah-Li-Ion-Panasonic-Power-Tools-EYC110LA2L/p/11096392
item.summary: SK P// Wrong Key: People who bought this product also bought

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Fixed in Test and Prod.
You can test now

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6228] HU P // Keys in the shop - please SWAP 2 keys
item.description:
Please change the text as following:
The words had to be SWAP!

“Felhasznalonev” means “Benutzername” and that is on the wrong place.
“Bejelentkezes” means “Anmeldung” and that’s on the wrong place too!

Just flip the words.

Thank you.
Peter Szuchomelli
Technik
item.summary: HU P // Keys in the shop - please SWAP 2 keys
